mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_share_links (share_token, default_role, group_id, is_deleted, created_at, expires_at) VALUES (#{shareToken}, #{defaultRole}, #{groupId}, 'F', NOW(), #{expiresAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, share_token, default_role, is_deleted, created_at, modified_at, expires_at, group_id FROM group_share_links WHERE share_token = #{shareToken} AND is_deleted = 'F' AND (expires_at IS NULL OR expires_at > NOW())

SELECT id, share_token, default_role, is_deleted, created_at, modified_at, expires_at, group_id FROM group_share_links WHERE group_id = #{groupId} AND is_deleted = 'F' AND (expires_at IS NULL OR expires_at > NOW()) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE group_share_links SET is_deleted = 'T', modified_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE group_share_links SET is_deleted = 'T', modified_at = NOW() WHERE group_id = #{groupId}
